sentence.Network_en: He was very open-minded about other people's work.

sentence.Network_en: It is advisable to take an open - minded approach to new ideas.
sentence.Network_cn: 对新思想采取不存先入之见的态度是明智的.

entry.tran: 思想开明的；愿意接受他人观点（或建议）的；无偏见的
entry.def: If you describe someone as open-minded, you approve of them because they are willing to listen to and consider other people's ideas and suggestions.

example.ex: He was very open-minded about other people's work.
example.tran: 他对别人的工作不存先入之见。

means.word_mean: 心胸宽的,能接受新思想的;无先入之见的,无偏见的

sentences.en: You can talk to her about anything—she’s very open-minded.
sentences.cn: 你什么事都可以跟她谈,她思想很开明。

sentences.en: It is advisable to take an open-minded approach to new ideas.
sentences.cn: 对新思想采取不存先入之见的态度是明智的。

sentences.en: The well-known writer is open-minded enough to admit that not all his novels are first-rate.
sentences.cn: 那位著名作家很虚心,承认他的小说并非全是上乘之作。
